summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bharatanatyam AI Story Generator - both backend APIs and frontend UI are functional with minor backend status code issue

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 520 status code instead of 400 for invalid file validation
flaky_endpoints.impact: Error handling works but HTTP status code is incorrect

passed_tests: Landing page loads with correct dark theme and temple red accents
Navigation between landing page and dashboard works correctly
Dashboard components load properly (upload section, story panel, timeline)
Video upload interface present with proper validation setup
Story panel shows correct placeholder content
Timeline section displays appropriate placeholder text
Typography loads correctly (Playfair Display for headings, Manrope for body)
Color scheme matches requirements (dark background rgb(5,5,5), temple red rgb(217,56,30))
Backend API root endpoint returns correct response
Backend error handling for invalid analysis IDs works correctly
Backend list analyses endpoint functions properly
success_percentage: Backend: 83% (5/6 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI components and navigation working)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix backend upload-video endpoint to return proper 400 status code instead of 520 for invalid file validation. The validation logic works correctly but HTTP status code handling needs improvement.
